history.subject: 在各种操作系统平台上计算md5的小工具
history.content:
<md>Ubuntu 12.04&14.04, Mac OS:
```
find ./temp -type f -print0 | xargs -0 md5 >> ./checksums_temp.md5
```
CentOS, Debian:
```
find ./backup -type f -print0 | xargs -0 /usr/bin/md5sum >> ./svn/checksums_svn.md5
```
FreeNAS:
```
find /mnt/user/cifs/work/CDs -type f -print0 | xargs -0 /sbin/md5 >> /mnt/user/cifs/work/checksums_CDs.md5
```
windows:
http://download.microsoft.com/download/c/f/4/cf454ae0-a4bb-4123-8333-a1b6737712f7/windows-kb841290-x86-enu.exe
```
C:\Users\xyong\configuration\fciv\fciv.exe -add F:\ >> C:\Users\xyong\work\svn\chechsum.md5
C:\"Program Files"\md5sum\fciv.exe -add C:\Users\xyong\Documents\17 >> C:\Users\xyong\Documents\chechsum.md5
```

Solaris:
```
digest -v -a md5 sntp.py
```
也许同学还能找到更好用的小工具。欢迎更新。</md>

history.subject: 在各种操作系统平台上计算md5的小工具

<md>Ubuntu 12.04&14.04, Mac OS:
find ./temp -type f -print0 | xargs -0 md5 >> ./checksums_temp.md5

CentOS, Debian:
find ./backup -type f -print0 | xargs -0 /usr/bin/md5sum >> ./svn/checksums_svn.md5

FreeNAS:
find /mnt/user/cifs/work/CDs -type f -print0 | xargs -0 /sbin/md5 >> /mnt/user/cifs/work/checksums_CDs.md5

windows:
http://tilt.lib.tsinghua.edu.cn/node/640
http://download.microsoft.com/download/c/f/4/cf454ae0-a4bb-4123-8333-a1b6737712f7/windows-kb841290-x86-enu.exe

C:\Users\xyong\configuration\fciv\fciv.exe -add F:\ >> C:\Users\xyong\work\svn\chechsum.md5
C:\"Program Files"\md5sum\fciv.exe -add C:\Users\xyong\Documents\17 >> C:\Users\xyong\Documents\chechsum.md5

Solaris:
```
digest -v -a md5 sntp.py
```</md>

children.subject:
<md>md5sum 属于 coreutils 包，Windows 可以通过 Scoop (https://scoop.sh/) 安装。
```
scoop install coreutils
```</md>
